title: Appendix F: Dimensional Decomposition
abstract: Explicit decomposition of the 26-dimensional bulk into observable and compactified dimensions: M^26 = M^4 × T^15 × G_2^7

content_blocks.content: The 26-dimensional bulk decomposes explicitly into observable and compactified dimensions:

content_blocks.label: 26D bulk decomposition into observable 4D, 15-torus, and G₂ manifold

content_blocks.content:
# dim_decomp_v12_8.py
def dim_decomp() -> Dict:
    """Explicit dimensional decomposition of 26D bulk to 4D observed."""
    total_dims = 26
    observed = 4
    extra = total_dims - observed  # 22
    g2_dim = 7
    t_dim = extra - g2_dim  # 15

    return {
        'decomposition': f'26D = 4D x T^{t_dim} x G2({g2_dim}D)',
        'physics_role': {
            'g2_manifold': 'Generates chiral fermions, determines n_gen = 3',
            'torus': 'Allows flux quantization, moduli stabilization',
            'observed': 'Standard Model physics'
        }
    }

# Result: 26D = 4D x T^15 x G2(7D)
content_blocks.label: Python code for dimensional decomposition calculation
